head.title: Motion Picture Academy Seeks Fresh Faces

hedline.hl1: Motion Picture Academy Seeks Fresh Faces

block.p: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences opened its rolls slightly yesterday, extending invitations to 115 prospective members. The additions would bring the film academy's voting membership to just under 6,000, and fell short of the maximum of 150 new members authorized by academy rules for the year. Among actors 16 invitees include Jennifer Aniston,Steve Carell, Daniel Craig and Christopher Plummer. Six directors invited to join included Peter Berg, Antoine Fuqua and Paul Greengrass.
